errors.error_description: Added unnecessary system dependency installation for a Home Assistant custom component that doesn't require system packages
correction_candidates: Remove system dependency installation as Home Assistant custom components don't require manual system package installation
Replace system packages with Python virtual environment setup using `python -m venv battery_notes_env`
Change to Docker container setup instead of system package installation
Update to use Home Assistant Supervisor add-on installation method
errors.golden_answer: Remove system dependency installation as Home Assistant custom components don't require manual system package installation
